channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Side Menu Lite – add sticky fixed buttons
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Side Menu Lite – add sticky fixed buttons

item.title: CVE-2021-24521|2024-08-03T19:35:19.972Z -- unknown -- side%20menu%20lite%20%E2%80%93%20add%20sticky%20fixed%20buttons
item.description: The Side Menu Lite – add sticky fixed buttons WordPress plugin before 2.2.1 does not properly sanitize input values from the browser when building an SQL statement. Users with the administrator role or permission to manage this plugin could perform an SQL Injection attack.
